plays.text: Penalty to Sergei Zubov 2 minutes for Hooking Tom Fitzgerald
Goal scored by Denis Arkhipov assisted by Kimmo Timonen and Martin Erat
Penalty to Denis Arkhipov 2 minutes for Tripping Pierre Turgeon
2 minute Bench Penalty for Too Many Men on the Ice served by REID SIMPSON
Penalty to Derian Hatcher 2 minutes for Crosschecking Vladimir Orszagh
Penalty to Martin Erat 2 minutes for Unsportsmanlike Conduct(opposing player not identified)
Penalty to Brad Lukowich 2 minutes for Interference Bill Houlder
Goal scored by Vladimir Orszagh assisted by Denis Arkhipov and Petr Tenkrat
Penalty to Scott Hartnell 5 minutes for Fighting Scott Pellerin
Penalty to Scott Pellerin 5 minutes for Fighting Scott Hartnell
Penalty to Scott Pellerin 2 minutes for Roughing Scott Hartnell
Penalty to Cale Hulse 2 minutes for Boarding Brenden Morrow
Penalty to Joe Nieuwendyk 2 minutes for Roughing(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Pat Verbeek assisted by Richard Matvichuk and Joe Nieuwendyk
Penalty to Cale Hulse 2 minutes for Hooking Mike Modano
